title: Cheese Curry Recipe
description: A flavorful and creamy cheese curry that's perfect for a cozy dinner.
instructions:
1. Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter.
2. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
3. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.
4. Add tomato puree and cook until the oil separates.
5. Add coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
6. Add yogurt and cook until the mixture thickens.
7. Add cream and paneer cubes. Simmer for 5 minutes.
8. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Potato Tomato Vegetable Recipe
description: A simple and nutritious vegetable dish made with potatoes and tomatoes.
instructions:
1. Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter.
2. Add chopped onions and green chilies. Sauté until onions are translucent.
3. Add diced potatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
4. Cook covered on medium heat until potatoes are tender.
5. Add chopped tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes.
6. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with roti or rice.

title: Cabbage Recipe
description: A simple and tasty cabbage stir-fry that's quick to make.
instructions:
1. Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds and cumin seeds. Let them splutter.
2. Add chopped onions and green chilies. Sauté until onions turn golden brown.
3. Add sliced cabbage, turmeric powder, and salt. Mix well.
4. Cook covered on low heat until cabbage is tender, stirring occasionally.
5. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with roti or rice.

title: Cauliflower Recipe
description: A delicious and healthy cauliflower dish that's perfect as a side or main.
instructions:
1. Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
2. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.
3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft and mushy.
4. Add turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
5. Add cauliflower florets and toss to coat with the spice mixture.
6. Cover and cook on medium heat until cauliflower is tender, stirring occasionally.
7. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with chapati or rice.
